name: Last Boat Afloat
description:
2D couch-multiplayer ship battle 

I made (hopefully) a fun game to play with your friends... on the couch. You choose the map and your ship's perks to defeat your friends in sea battle... and be the last one floating.

The game is played with gamepads, for 2 to 4 players.

IMPORTANT INFO - The game has following limitations:

  • playable only with gamepads
  • key bindings cannot be changed
  • available only for Windows and Ubuntu

I expect the issues to occur so please if you encounter some, report them to me via email to xartcraftx@gmail.com. I'll be uploading new versions of the game with patches to those issues.

Also, any good or bad comments on the game are welcome but keep in mind this is my first game so please be gentle.  xD

Thank you for downloading the game <3
